name: Space ship panic
description:
HE IS INSIDE YOU. HE WANTS TO TAKE OVER. KEEP HIM OUT.

Space ship panic (SSP) is a short little horror game made in GDevelop.

You play as a service robot infected by some evil virus that has taken over the ship, you must keep the ship in order and take care of the power and life support since you were never programed for failure making it the perfect entry point. 

this game is still in development and only has one level right now, just keep that in mind.
